message: I'll take 90 and leave you 10.  It's a fair starting point.  Let's get this done quickly.
Let's meet in the middle, 60-40 is a more reasonable split.
I'm willing to give up a bit more, but 70-30 feels fairer to me. If we keep going back and forth, the money is only going to decrease faster.
Considering the inflation, let's compromise at 55-45 to save the value.
